item.title: 白話解 Leetcode - 23 Merge k Sorted Lists
item.description: 23. Merge k Sorted Lists https://leetcode.com/problems/merge-k-sorted-lists/ HardYou are given an array of k linked-lists lists, each linked-list is sorted in ascending order. Merge all the linked-lists into one sorted linked-list and return it.   Example 1: Input: lists = [[1,4,5],[1,3,4],[2,6]] Output: [1,1,2,3,4,4,5,6] Explanation: The linked-lists are: [ 1->4->5, 1->3->4, 2->6 ] merging them into one sorted list: 1->1->2->3->4->4->5->6 Example 2: Input: lists = [] Output: [] Example 3: Input: lists
